org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce

Class JobSubmissionFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobSubmissionFiles

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class JobSubmissionFiles
extends Object
    A utility to manage job submission files.

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getStagingDir(Cluster cluster,
                                                      org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                                               throws IOException,

        Initializes the staging directory and returns the path. It also keeps track of all necessary ownership and permissions
        Parameters:
        cluster -
        conf -
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • getStagingDir

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getStagingDir(Cluster cluster,
                                                      org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                      org.apache.hadoop.security.UserGroupInformation realUser)
                                               throws IOException,
                                                      InterruptedException
        Initializes the staging directory and returns the path. It also keeps track of all necessary ownership and permissions. It is kept for unit testing.
        Parameters:
        cluster - Information about the map/reduce cluster
        conf - Configuration object
        realUser - UserGroupInformation of login user
        Returns:
        staging dir path object
        Throws:
        IOException - when ownership of staging area directory does not match the login user or current user.
        InterruptedException - when getting the staging area directory path
